overview:
Esther Resendiz is an entrepreneur and co-founder of DatingSauce.com, a site where dating coaches and personal stylists provide personal, confidential advice to singles.

She has an Electrical Engineering background, and specialized in Computer Vision for her Ph.D. She was inspired by her interest in fashion to create FashionLatte, Inc. while in graduate school, where she and her labmates/co-founders implemented visual search for apparel. She also collaborated on several projects with the Railroad Engineering Program while at the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign. Prior to that, she dabbled in many different fields within Electrical Engineering, both hardware and software.
